title: @Meddler Any plans for Taliyah after the Rylai's nerfs?
body: She's already hurting pretty badly, and I would hazard a guess that these nerfs are going to twist the knife. She gonna be up for buffs in the near future?

replies.body:
Same as Mordekaiser

Waiting and reassessing them after the changes hit.
That's probably a good idea, reactionary buffs probably won't work out all that well.
just wish they would revert the vector cast and lockout change.  it didnt make her easier to play like it was intended.

It's now a 1 second slow, something Taliyah or Aurelion Sol, champions with a lot of constant damage output through a singular ability, don't need to worry about.

Oh and a 25 magic damage reduction, maybe increase their damage on their main abilities, Tali's Q, and ASol's W, by 5 to make up for that

And a halved slow, sooooo maybe an increase in their movement speed

I'm not convinced the slow nerf is going to be as bad as you think. 

I doubt she'll really need much more than a little nudge.

That's entirely possible, I'm not even a novice at game balance, just a mage player that's concerned about the champions I love to play. 




...Except for Viktor and Syndra fuck those two, but that's a personal problem.
